name: AI Newsletter
description: Generates AI-powered email newsletters featuring recently added media content with human-like descriptions and recommendations
overview: An intelligent newsletter plugin that uses artificial intelligence to create engaging, personalized email newsletters showcasing your recently added movies, TV shows, music, and other media. Features AI-generated descriptions, modern responsive email templates, and comprehensive scheduling options.

versions.changelog: Initial release with AI-powered newsletter generation, modern email templates, OpenAI/Anthropic integration, SMTP delivery, and automated scheduling
